mama kalin liwwa bambaasara kawiyata labunu imahath pataka prathichara nisa hithuwa liyanna thawath ee aarema kawiyak.aththama kiyanawanam meka kalin kawiye mul kotasa wenna oona.eeth ithin holiwud film gahanneth kathawa mulin gahala aarambae deweniyata dena eka ne...mama mekata purudu karayage kawiya kiyala nama damme penena yati arthetath wadiya thawa ekak athule thiyana nisa .kohoma unath meka magen liyawichcha thawath wenas widiye kawiyak .meke sangawunu yatipela therenawada balanna.mama adahas kare apita therena deta yatin thiyana eka.

“mama mekata uththare heta kiyannam...”

dhanushka pilibanda mema prawruththiya pasale widuhalpathiniya wetha da salawanu laduwa aya ohu shishya upadeshanaya bhara guruwaraya wetha yomu karana ladde meya dhanushka thula pawathina manasika asamathulitha bawak bawa wataha ganimen pasuwa ehidi dhanushkagen asa dana gath karunu anuwa ema guruwaraya dhanushka mano waidyawarayaku hamuwata path kala yuthu yayi thiranaya kale eya samanya upadeshanayen wisandiya nohaki arbudayak bawini.

perawaru 06.15-07.15 sil samadan karawima, theruwan wandanawa ha buddha pujawa meheyawima, panapitiye wijithananda himi 07.15-09.45 dharmadeshanawa /bhawanawa thapowanaye sumedha himi, 10.00-11.00 dharma deshanawa ha dawal buddha pujawa meheyawima, lenawa mangala himi.paswaru 01.00-02.45 dharma deshanawa kotaneluwe punynyananda himi, 03.00-04.30 dharma deshanawa dorapane rathanasara himi, 04.45-06.00 dharma deshanawa, sil pawaranaya ha aluth kirima , paragasthota sudhamma himi, 06.15-07.00 panadure ariyadhamma swamin wahanse pawathwu bodhi pujawa (patigatha karana lada) 07.10-08.30 gihi desuma dharmacharya ke.paranawithana mahatha meheyawana nawa arahadi pahan pujawa , rathri 08.45 sathipattana deshanaya galkisse samahitha himi, poda perawaru 06.00 - 07.15 sil samadan karawima anushasanawa saha buddha pujawa rajakiya panditha shasthrapathi thirikunamale aananda maha na himi. 08.00 - 09.00 dharmanushasanawa gaurawa shasthrawedi kotaneluwe punynyananda himi, 09.00 - 10.00 dharma sakachchawa siri wajirarama daham pasal pradhanacharya gaurawa shasthrawedi migoda sukhitha himi, 10.00 - 11.15 bhawanawa anushasanawa siri wajiraramawasi bandarawela nyanaruchi himi, 12.30 - 01.15 sathipattana suthra deshanawa siri wajirararamadhikari siri wajirarama dahampasale adhyakshaka kambaurugamuwe mahanaga himi, 01.15 - 02.30 gihi deshanaya jyeshta kathikacharya je.bi. disanayaka shurihu, 03.00 - 04.00 bhawanawa saha anushasanawa siri wajiraramawasi pitipana sasanarathana himi, 04.00 - 05.00 dharmanushasanawa adhyapanawedi kalaniye sasanawansha himi, 05.00 - 06.00 dharmanushasanawa rajakiya panditha shasthrapathi kirama rahula himi, 06.00 - 06.30 atawisi buddha wandanawa ha sil aluth kirima siri wajiraramawasi swaminwahansela.
